xwikidoc.name: Welcome
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: $services.localization.render('manager.dashboard.welcome')
xwikidoc.content:
A workspace is a place that you can create to collaborate with other users in order to: * better structure your content beyond just pages and spaces * quickly start working on a new project or idea * collaborate more efficiently on a focused topic by using the applications you need and like and by not colliding with other projects
Any registered user can create a workspace and invite other users to join.
Note: The old XEM homepage can still be accessible as [[Wiki Dashboard>>WikiManager.Dashboard]].
